name: Space Shooter (lele25811)
description:
Classic Space Shooter Game 

How To Play:

- Use WASD for move the Spaceship.

-Use Space for Shoot

-Press R for Restart

Credits:

Game Made in Godot Engine

Developer: lele25811 ( http://lele25811.altervista.org/index.html )

Assets:  https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment

Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-sound-effects
